title: (x) "Bliss" connected script on Kellogg's Special K packaging - House Script {Lari}
content:
Can anyone help me identify the font on this packaging? The word "Bliss" on the package...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024005803/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_60.jpg) | 17.31 KB |
author: e_a_camp

comments.content: House Script from the Sign Painter collection.

Lari's absolutely right. [Here's a link](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024005803/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=23&subpage=viewfonts). If you use LetterSetter you'll see it matches exactly.

- Mike Yanega
